rooms.description: A welcoming entrance space that transitions from the exterior to the interior.
Open-plan living area with a view of the central courtyard, promoting social gatherings.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area for seamless interaction and cooking convenience.
Functional bathroom placed with consideration to privacy and easy access from the bedroom.

openings.description: Provides natural lighting and ventilation for the living area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, aligning with Vastu for peaceful sleep.
En-suite bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom.

openings.description: Widely spaced staircase connecting ground and first floors.

rooms.description: Central open courtyard providing natural light and ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles.

directional_focus.north: Positive energy flow for the living area.
directional_focus.east: Ideal location for the kitchen and dining space.

vastu_notes.space_alignment: The design maintains symmetry between residential activities ensuring harmonious balance.
